channel.title: Daily News - Sweden, Northern Ireland & UK
channel.description: Twice-daily top headlines from Sweden, Northern Ireland & UK (09:00 & 18:00)

item.title: Sweden: Government announces new energy policy
item.description: Sweden unveils major reforms in its national energy strategy, focusing on renewables and nuclear expansion.

item.title: Northern Ireland: Talks resume at Stormont
item.description: Power-sharing negotiations resume in Belfast amid renewed calls for compromise between parties.

item.title: UK: Inflation falls to lowest level in 3 years
item.description: UK inflation drops below 2%, raising hopes for an interest rate cut later this year.

item.title: TEST NOTIFICATION: Feed update check
item.description: This is a test item to make sure IFTTT is sending notifications properly.
